blocks.name: axextdfeq
blocks.content: A version of ~ ax-ext for use with defined equality. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Dec-2010.)

blocks.name: ax8dfeq
blocks.content: A version of ~ ax-8 for use with defined equality. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 12-Dec-2010.)

blocks.name: axextdist
blocks.content: ~ ax-ext with distinctors instead of distinct variable restrictions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Dec-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm axextdist(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wi(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wi(wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
} = {
  syl6bir(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wal(hs0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))))
  cbvald(hs0, s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  nfan(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  nfnae(s0, s0, s2)
  nfbid(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)))
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, cv(s1), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantr(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s1)))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, cv(s2), wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  adantl(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wnfc(s0, cv(s2)))
  nfcvf(s0, s2)
  a1i(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2))), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  elequ1(hs0, s0, s1)
  elequ1(hs0, s0, s2)
  axext3(hs0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
  diff.hs0.w(wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s2))
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm axextdist(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  ⊢ ((¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2))→(∀(s0,(s0 ∈ s1 ↔ s0 ∈ s2))→ s1 = s2))
} = {
  syl6bir((¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2)), ∀(s0,(s0 ∈ s1 ↔ s0 ∈ s2)), s1 = s2, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ s1 ↔ hs0 ∈ s2)))
  cbvald(hs0, s0, (¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2)), (hs0 ∈ s1 ↔ hs0 ∈ s2), (s0 ∈ s1 ↔ s0 ∈ s2))
  nfan(s0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2))
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  nfnae(s0, s0, s2)
  nfbid(s0, (¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2)), hs0 ∈ s1, hs0 ∈ s2)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, s1, (¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2)))
  adantr(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2), F/(s0, s1))
  nfcvf(s0, s1)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, s2, (¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2)))
  adantl(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2), F/(s0, s2))
  nfcvf(s0, s2)
  a1i((¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2)), (hs0 = s0 →((hs0 ∈ s1 ↔ hs0 ∈ s2)↔(s0 ∈ s1 ↔ s0 ∈ s2))))
  bibi12d(hs0 = s0, hs0 ∈ s1, hs0 ∈ s2, s0 ∈ s1, s0 ∈ s2)
  elequ1(hs0, s0, s1)
  elequ1(hs0, s0, s2)
  axext3(hs0, s1, s2)
  diff.hs0.w((¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)∧ ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s2)))
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ∈ s1 ↔ s0 ∈ s2))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(s2)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: axext4dist
blocks.content: ~ axext4 with distinctors instead of distinct variable restrictions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Dec-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm axext4dist(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2) {
  |- wi(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wb(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))))
} = {
  impbid(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  syld(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  imp(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  axc9(s0, s1, s2)
  alimd(s0, wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  nfan(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  nfnae(s0, s0, s2)
  a1i(wa(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2))))), wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)))))
  elequ2(s1, s2, s0)
  axextdist(s0, s1, s2)
}

blocks.name: 19.12b
blocks.content: Version of ~ 19.12vv with not-free hypotheses, instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Dec-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm 19.12b(setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))), wal(s1, wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  a1ii(wb(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))), wal(s1, wex(s0, wi(w0, w1)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  3bitri(wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w1))), wal(s1, wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))), wex(s0, wi(w0, wal(s1, w1))), wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1)))
  exbii(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, wal(s1, w1)))
  19.21(s1, w0, w1)
  19.36(s0, w0, wal(s1, w1))
  nfal(s0, s1, w1)
  bitr2i(wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1)), wal(s1, wex(s0, wi(w0, w1))), wal(s1, wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)))
  albii(s1, wex(s0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(wal(s0, w0), w1))
  19.36(s0, w0, w1)
  19.21(s1, wal(s0, w0), w1)
  nfal(s1, s0, w0)
}

blocks.name: exnel
blocks.content: There is always a set not in ` y ` . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Dec-2010.)

blocks.name: distel
blocks.content: Distinctors in terms of membership. (NOTE: this only works with relations where we can prove ~ el and ~ elirrv .) (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Dec-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm distel(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  |- wb(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
} = {
  impbii(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  mpbii(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wal(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))
  el(hs0, s1)
  syl5bb(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(hs0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wn(wal(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))), wn(wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))))))
  df-ex(hs0, wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  notbid(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wal(hs0, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))), wal(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
  cbvald(hs0, s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  nfnd(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  nf5d(s0, wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  dveel1(s0, s1, hs0)
  a1i(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wb(wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0))), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  elequ2(hs0, s0, s1)
  con3i(wal(s0, wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  alimi(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  mtbii(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s0)))
  elirrv(s0)
  elequ1(s0, s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wal(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm distel(setvar s0, setvar s1) {
  ⊢ (¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1)↔ ¬ ∀(s0, ¬ s1 ∈ s0))
} = {
  impbii(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ¬ ∀(s0, ¬ s1 ∈ s0))
  mpbii(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ¬ ∀(s0, ¬ s1 ∈ s0), ∃(hs0, s1 ∈ hs0))
  el(hs0, s1)
  syl5bb(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ∃(hs0, s1 ∈ hs0), ¬ ∀(s0, ¬ s1 ∈ s0), ¬ ∀(hs0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0))
  df-ex(hs0, s1 ∈ hs0)
  notbid(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ∀(hs0, ¬ s1 ∈ hs0), ∀(s0, ¬ s1 ∈ s0))
  cbvald(hs0, s0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), ¬ s1 ∈ hs0, ¬ s1 ∈ s0)
  nfnd(s0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), s1 ∈ hs0)
  nf5d(s0, ¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), s1 ∈ hs0)
  nfnae(s0, s0, s1)
  dveel1(s0, s1, hs0)
  a1i(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1), (hs0 = s0 →(¬ s1 ∈ hs0 ↔ ¬ s1 ∈ s0)))
  notbid(hs0 = s0, s1 ∈ hs0, s1 ∈ s0)
  elequ2(hs0, s0, s1)
  con3i(∀(s0, ¬ s1 ∈ s0), ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  alimi(s0, s0 = s1, ¬ s1 ∈ s0)
  mtbii(s0 = s1, s1 ∈ s0, s0 ∈ s0)
  elirrv(s0)
  elequ1(s0, s1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ ∀(s0, s0 = s1))
  diff.hs0.w(¬ s1 ∈ s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: axextndbi
blocks.content: ~ axextnd as a biconditional. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 14-Dec-2010.)
